title: Investigate Suspected Pipeline Theft
description: A volume balance analysis shows a consistent loss of product in a specific pipeline segment, suggesting a possible illegal tap.

tasks.description: Run a detailed volume balance on the suspect pipeline segment over the last 30 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis confirms a small but consistent daily loss that cannot be explained by measurement error.

tasks.description: Dispatch a helicopter or drone to fly the pipeline right-of-way, looking for suspicious activity or ground disturbances.
tasks.expected_outcome: The aerial surveillance identifies an unauthorized track leading to the pipeline in a remote area.

tasks.description: Notify corporate security and local law enforcement of the suspected illegal tap location for further investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The relevant authorities are engaged to handle the criminal investigation.
